snippet: While the federal government cracks down on dispensaries of medical marijuana, Los Angeles repealed a recent ban on them.
abstract: Federal law enforcement officials are cracking down on medical marijuana dispensaries in California, even as Los Angeles City Council repeals a ban on them; confusion underlines how booming and divisive industry has thrown the state into chaos.
lead_paragraph: While the federal government cracks down on dispensaries of medical marijuana, Los Angeles repealed a recent ban on them.

headline.seo: California Fight to Ensure Marijuana Goes Only to the Sick
headline.main: Marijuana Only for the Sick? A Farce, Some Angelenos Say
headline.print_headline: Marijuana Only for the Sick? A Farce, Some in Los Angeles Say
